CIL static CIL object to put and get metadata object to a storage through cilInterface var customer=CIL.get("customer/12");
CilDataSet CilDataSet is used by CIL APIs, It has the following properties: address : path in CIL storage dataObj : data object instance when calling CIL.get(...), dataObj contains the data object restored from CIL storage.
Config  
Confirm Confirm class.
Context  
Controller Controller is an object that represents a User Interface instance at runtime (an instance of com.conceptwave.system.UserInterface metadata type).
The methods listed in the Script Documentation are native java methods available for scripting.
In addition to java native methods, Controller object has script methods defined at the metadata level in the System template.

Finder A finder is an object that allows to perform search for data in different data sources (data bases, external system interfaces, etc.), as well as perform get delete and update operation.
Global List of miscellaneous static methods that can be used in any script.

The following constants are defined: Global.STOP_UI - closes the Object Window. Global.SET_ROOT - refer to Global.setCurrentObject documentation. Global.SET_PARENT - refer to Global.setCurrentObject documentation. Global.SET_CURRENT - refer to Global.setCurrentObject documentation.

This class provides the common information about a business process.
